title: HOUR 1 - Chiefs-Bills, Herbert, NFC
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Chiefs-Bills, Herbert, NFC
description:
The Chiefs are not a dynasty and it showed yesterday

The Chargers take more risks with Justin Herbert

Colin talks about the best teams in the NFC

Herbert had to overcome a lot last season


Guest: Michael Vick

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
